content: **meet juniper frost** ❄️ my newest free christmas duck pattern made with **scheepjes little darling sparkle** the shimmer yarn that somehow manages to be both festive and incredibly easy to work with ✨ this little cutie is part of my ongoing collab with the scheepjes little darling 1 line and i couldn t resist giving her a soft winter glow using little darling sparkle 2 if you ve been nervous to try glitter yarn this one is a dream ld sparkle is gentle on the hands has minimal shedding and is the perfect touch of magic for holiday makes you can read more about how i helped curate scheepjes first chenille yarn on my website 3 juniper frost is quick cozy and ready to bring a bit of christmas shimmer to your home juniper is approximately 7inches/18cm tall using recommended yarn please note that this pattern is for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell the item that you make from this pattern but i ask that you please refer back to me as the designer please do not share reproduce or sell this pattern online or in print thank you for your support 1 https //www scheepjes com/en/little-darling-13431/ 2 https //www scheepjes com/en/little-darling-sparkle-14024/ 3 https //sarahdeecrochet com/littledarlings/
